Crimes.Crime_Name: Obtaining citizenship by false representation or fraud
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether revocation proceedings should be stayed due to health, delay, or file destruction
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 50(1)(b) of the Federal Court Act
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Alleged abuse of process and unfairness due to health, delay, and missing files
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Civil nature of proceedings; no Charter Section 7 applicability
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Abuse of process and fairness under civil procedure
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Section 50(1)(b) FCA – stay in the interest of justice
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Appropriateness of a stay in civil revocation proceedings
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Section 50(1)(b) of the Federal Court Act
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: No abuse of process or breach of procedural fairness established
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: Section 50(1)(b), Federal Court Act; Section 7, Charter of Rights and Freedoms (distinguished)
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Missing immigration files, adequacy of medical evidence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Charter rights, abuse of process, delay, health
Relevant_Law: Charter of Rights and Freedoms (limited application)

Relevant_Law: Charter of Rights and Freedoms (limited application)
